Package com.google.code.gwt.database.client.service

Provides for simplified Database services, called the DataService API.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Callback All DataServiceXxxCallback interfaces mandate the same Callback.onFailure(DataServiceException) method, which is defined here.
DataService Marks an interface as a DataService.
ListCallback<T extends JavaScriptObject> Database service callback which expects a collection of items in the resultset.
RowIdListCallback Database service callback which expects a collection of ROWID's from executed INSERT statements as resultSet.
ScalarCallback<T> Database service callback which expects a single item in the resultset.
VoidCallback Database service callback which expects no query results.
 

Exception Summary
DataServiceException Represents an exception in DataService failure handling.
 

Annotation Types Summary
Connection Marks a Java interface as a Database Service with connection parameters.
Select Provides the SQL SELECT statement to be executed when the annotated method is called.
Update Provides the SQL update statement to be executed when the annotated method is called.
 

Package com.google.code.gwt.database.client.service Description

Provides for simplified Database services, called the DataService API.

Package Specification

This package contains the public interface to the DataService API. This DataService API is built on the Database API. DataServices are constructed with types solely from this package, starting with DataService.

Related Documentation

For tutorials, examples, guides, and background documentation, please see:
  • Wiki - GWT Mobile WebKit
